title: FS- Raw T206 NY American - Kleinow

posts.post_title: FS- Raw T206 NY American - Kleinow
posts.post_content:
Selling the following cards to fund recent purchase.  Prices include delivery.  Email replies only please ( [url]mantista@energizer.com[/url] ).  Prefer PayPal (money owed only please) at [url]mcantista@juno.com[/url], otherwise check/money order.  Card images are clear.  My scanner is terrible.
 
Thanks, Mike.

Frill - creases, rounded corners, nice color - $21 SOLD
[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/NY%20Amer%20T-Cards/002-3-2-1.jpg[/IMG]

Kleinow batting - creases, rounded corners, nice color - $23
[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/NY%20Amer%20T-Cards/002-3-1-1.jpg[/IMG]

bump for price redux and removing card sold. thanks

open to offers.
